name: Bud Muffins
description: Flames are fun and easy to draw, a good decision for my first color comic. Baking muffins can be difficult, but the results are well worth it.

name: Extra Credit
description: I get if you want a nice car to impress the Joneses (not really, but I understand other people feel that way), but to tower 20 feet over other monuments in the graveyard? Who are you impressing there?

name: Dinner for Two
description: I ate alone quite a bit, small talk can ruin a perfectly good meal.

name: For the Love of the Game
description: They say 90% of sports is mental. The game is won or lost in your mind, before you step onto the pitcher's mound. But if you spend too much time in your head, you won't see the bat coming towards it from and imbalanced fan.

name: Soft Drinks
description: I think Mamma and Pappa Coke have an important message to share: 'Coming out' is a confusing and emotional time, but the support of friends and loved ones can make all the difference. Just need a little humor, and a lot of love. After all, someone has to make the world fabulous.

name: Freedom Writers
description: BMGT 364: Operations and Management. That's where it all began. Good lord that class was drier than Saltines. If I spent as much time paying attention in class as I did doodling...I'd probably be twice as bored and half as happy.

name: Different Batch, Same Recipe
description: People say those who bully are hiding their own pain and insecurities. Well, most murderers don't have well adjusted lives either. Nothing excuses that behvior. Fuck bullies, and all those who support and enable them.

name: Humpty: True England Stories
description: The chicken is saying 'pain', but my n's are hit or miss some days.
